content.query:
create DATABASE [db-parquet]

create master key encryption by PASSWORD = 'dp203@password' --encrypt the password

create database scoped credential sastoken
with identity = 'shared access signature'
, secret = 'sv=2022-11-02&ss=b&srt=sc&sp=rwlac&se=2023-08-30T22:53:33Z&st=2023-08-09T14:53:33Z&spr=https&sig=Gw3zWqaN8HekkmIJ2yH2JJbEpVzxFGpNR54oNyCNFZ8%3D'

create external data source log_data_parquet
with (Location='https://datalakedemodp203.dfs.core.windows.net/parquet',
credential = sastoken)

create external file format ParquetTextFileFormat with(
    FORMAT_TYPE=PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
        )

--for parquet files, set all columns as varchar and all columns headers should not have any space
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [logdata_parquet] 
(
    [CorrelationId] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[OperationName] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[Status] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[EventCategory] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Level] [varchar](100) NULL,
	[Time] [varchar] (500) NULL,
	[Subscription] [varchar](200) NULL,
	[EventInitiated by] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[ResourceType] [varchar](1000) NULL,
	[ResourceGroup] [varchar](1000) NULL,
    [Resource] [varchar](2000) NULL)
WITH (
 LOCATION = 'Log.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = log_data_parquet,  
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetTextFileFormat
)
use appdb
go
select * from [logdata_parquet]

SELECT [Operation name] , COUNT([Operation name]) as [Operation Count]
FROM [logdata_parquet]
GROUP BY [Operation name]
ORDER BY [Operation Count]
